example.name: passive
example.text: The longstanding position of the Recording Industry Association of America , a trade group based [*] in Washington , D.C. , is that [record companies , performers , songwriters and music publishers]-2 need [*-2]-1 to be remunerated [*-1] by government-imposed fees on the sale of blank tapes and recording equipment [*] to make up for royalties lost [*] to home taping .
example.arg: by government-imposed fees on the sale of blank tapes and recording equipment

predicate.note: Frames file for 'remunerate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
